participant_1.background:

i am fascinated with ghosts.
I broke my arm when I was a child, but it healed well.
i want to get married again.
I'm happy with my life and my health.

participant_2.background:
I like to stay active and go to the gym 3-4 times a week.
I went to the beach with my family and we had a blast!
I am not close to my family, but I have a great relationship with my fiance.
I love to make art and crafts on the weekends!
I like to spend my free time building things with my son.

content.text: Hey! It's going great! Just got done at the gym. You?
It's going well, I'm about to go to dance lessons with my boyfriend.
That's awesome! I love dancing. What kind of dances do you do?
We do ballroom, swing, and salsa. It's a lot of fun!
That sounds awesome! I've always wanted to learn ballroom dancing.
You should! It's a lot of fun and it's a great way to stay in shape.
I know, I really should. I'm just not sure where to start.
There are a lot of great dance studios around. I'm sure you could find one near you.
I'll have to look into it. Thanks for the suggestion!
So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I love to go to the beach. I love swimming, sunbathing, and just relaxing.
The beach is awesome! I love to swim and build sandcastles.
Me too! I love to build sandcastles with my boyfriend.
That sounds so cute! I love that you do things together.
Yeah, we have a lot of fun together.
That's great! I'm happy for you.
